About me

Romanian-based web developer and creative mind. With over 2 years of experience under my belt, I've been able to transform ideas into reality.

Professional experience

Mindsoft IT Solutions 2024 - 2025

IT Consultant

  • Data Integrity & Migration using complex SQL scripts for large-scale data migrations across distributed databases.
  • Troubleshooting by resolving critical database bugs and data entry discrepancies for clients under high-pressure environments.
  • Process Improvement by proposing documentation standards and password management protocols to reduce technical debt and improve team security.

Continental Automotive Systems 2022 - 2024

Software Development Intern

  • Developed custom BI dashboards using Node-RED to monitor real-time KPIs, improving team vistibility into techinician workloads and ticket lifecycles.
  • Automated JIRA workflows via REST API integrations, reducing manual administrative tasks by automating ticket assignments, priority shifts, and status updates.
  • Architected Data Links by creating RESTful endpoints to bridge the gap between internal Oracle databases and frontend visualization tools.
  • Maintained comprehensive documentation in Confluence, ensuring long-term maintainability for custom automation scripts.

Education

Universitatea "Lucian Blaga" din Sibiu 2020 - 2024

Information Technology

  • Programming Foundations: Algorithms, data structures, software design, OOP, and image processing.
  • Bachelor Thesis Project - Timetable website rework
    • Concept: Modernizing a legacy university system by migrating an outdated architecture to a high-performance, production-ready stack.
    • Stack: Developed using Laravel (PHP), and MySQL, focusing on high availability and clean code principles (DRY).
    • Real-Time Status Engine: Built a dynamic tracking system using Carbon logic to calculate and display "Current Course" and "Next Course" indicators based on the system's timezone.
    • Automated Notification System: Developed a role-based alert module that allows professors to broadcast critical updates to specific student groups.
    • Dynamic Rescheduling: Implemented a complex backend logic to handle one-time or recurring schedule changes without compromising data integrity.

Liceul Teoretic "Alexandru Marghiloman" Buzău 2016 - 2020

Mathematics & Computer Science

  • Programming Foundations: Intensive study of C++ data structures, and logic.
  • National Information and Communication Technology Olympiad (2017): Awarded the Bronze Medal at the national level, demonstrating advanced problem-solving skills under pressure.
  • Technical Certification Project - Nissan Skyline digital encyclopedia
    • Concept: Developed a comprehensive digital archive covering the lineage of the Nissan Skyline, from its origins as the Prince Skyline to the modern Infiniti Q50.
    • Technical Side: Built using HTML5, CSS3, and PHP (for a quiz section), focusing on responsive design and information architecture to handle complex historical data and multimedia.
    • Outcome: Earned the maximum grade for technical execution and content depth.
